title: Sunphosate 360SL (Glyphosate Herbicide | 1L)
fullDescription: Sunphosate is a systemic, non-selective herbicide used for controlling annual and perennial weeds. It contains 360g Glyphosate per liter...

title: Precision Seed and Fertilizer Planter
fullDescription: The precision seed and fertilizer planter is a manually operated machine with double compartments for seedling and fertilizers. It enables rapid planting, prevents overcrowding, and improves crop health and development...

title: High Quality Knapsack Sprayer (Various Brands) 16 Litres
fullDescription: The manually operated Knapsack sprayer is a piece of high-quality spraying equipment used to apply herbicides, pesticides, and fertilizers on agricultural crops and lands. Ideal for the home gardener, pest control, and fumigation...

title: ButaForce ®(Pre-Emergence | Selective | Systemic Herbicide)
shortDescription: A pre-emergence herbicide for annual weeds...
fullDescription: Butaforce is a chloroacetanilide class herbicide known for its pre-emergent activity on weeds. It is indicated for pre-emergence control of annual grasses and some broad-leaved weeds, particularly in rice crops...

title: Vitamin A D E (1 Liter)
shortDescription: A liquid feed supplement for poultry...
fullDescription: This liquid feed supplement for poultry comes in 1 Litre packs containing a powerful combination of vitamins. It is recommended for all laying birds, broilers, and growers...

title: Lavaside
fullDescription: Lavaside is a product designed to keep farms fly-free and poultry manure odourless. Available in 250g and 25kg packaging...

title: Miavit V.T.A Liquid
fullDescription: Miavit V.T.A liquid is a poultry feed supplement that promotes healthy growth and boosts overall bird performance. Comes in 1L packs...

title: Weedoff Contact Herbicide 1 Litre
shortDescription: A contact weed killer containing paraquat...
fullDescription: Weedoff is a contact herbicide recommended for the control of broadleaf weeds and grasses in arable land. It contains paraquat as the active ingredient...

title: Super Stem Nitrogen Amendment | Organic Black Earth | 1litre Spray
shortDescription: The Organic Black Earth Super Stem Nitrogen Amendment is a premium...
fullDescription: The Organic Black Earth Super Stem Nitrogen Amendment is a premium, eco-friendly solution designed to boost plant growth and health. This 1-liter spray is formulated with natural ingredients to provide essential nitrogen to your plants, ensuring robust stem development and overall vitality.

title: Guard Force Powder Herbicide | Post-emergence |100g
shortDescription: Guard Force is a selective post-emergence herbicide...
fullDescription: Guard Force is a selective post-emergence herbicide used to control annual grass weeds, broad‑leaved weeds and perennials grass weeds in maize farms. The product contains an active ingredient that is effective against weeds such as Sorghum halepense and Agropyron repens in maize. This is a product of Jubaili Agrotech.

title: Force Up Herbicide | 1liter |
shortDescription: We offer Force up herbicide, which is an effective product ...
fullDescription: We offer Force up herbicide, which is an effective product used to deal with weed and pest infestation on your farmland. This provided substance is ideal for the management of the most persistent annual and perennial grasses such as Cyanodon dactylon, Imperata cylindrica, Panicum maximum, etc.

title: Rechargeable Knapsack Sprayer (2-in-1 | Hand/Battery Powered)
fullDescription: The 2 in 1 Rechargeable Knapsack Sprayer comes with a rechargeable battery which means that the operator does not need to manually pump the sprayer thereby combining comfort and autonomy.

title: DD Force Insecticide (1 Liter)
shortDescription: DD FORCE is an organophosphate compound...
fullDescription: DD FORCE is an organophosphate compound with strong acaricidal actions and is recommended for farmers due to its poisonous effect on agricultural pests such as; spider mites, sucking and chewing insects, aphids, caterpillars, whiteflies e.t.c. by acting via stomach contact and respiratory poisoning.

title: Morigad Germicide - 4L
shortDescription: Morigad Germicide is a powerful multipurpose broad spectrum ...
fullDescription: Morigad Germicide is a powerful multipurpose broad spectrum disinfectant (active against bacteria, fungi, yeasts, protozoa, some viruses, and other microbes) for domestic, hospital, and animal husbandry uses because of its capability in retaining its activity in the presence of serum, blood, faeces, urine and other organic contaminants.

title: Five Star| Fungicide | 100ml
shortDescription: It’s time to control the effects of fungi diseases on your farm...
fullDescription: It’s time to control the effects of fungi diseases on your farm! Five-star fungicide is applicable to crops like cereals & legumes, vegetables, tree crops, horticultural crops, and ornamentals.
